channel.title: YouTube Downloader not working
channel.description:
Can anyone explain to me why the youtube downloader may not be working? [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vtPXN0tgNvs[/url]
I demonstrated my problem twice in that video, but as you can see with the second time around (starting at mile marker :50) after it is done 'downloading' the file BRIEFLY shows up (1:17) in the destination folder, and then it disappears.
Anyone have any clues as to what is going on? This is the newest version of YouTube Downloader.

item.title: YouTube Downloader not working
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.description:
sersoft:

Orbit downloader
will solve all of your problems

With this thing you can download any streaming video format from any site you might stumble upon.

I’m using this program aswell and it works great except for YouTube videos (they never start downloading), that’s why I suggested https://www.keepvid.com

Any idea why this happens?

item.title: YouTube Downloader not working
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
I guess you don’t use this browser, but if you were to use Safari, you could bring up the activities monitor of the webpage, find the video (.flv, usually 10-20mb big), and download it through that.

Anyway, to answer your question: I think YouTube wants to avoid people downloading the movies due to copyright infringements, so they keep changing their code/structure to stop those apps from styling movies that have songs/copyrights on them.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Downloader not working

item.description:
If you’re in a hurry, try using https://www.keepvid.com

item.title: YouTube Downloader not working
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Can anyone explain to me why the youtube downloader may not be working?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vtPXN0tgNvs

I demonstrated my problem twice in that video, but as you can see with the second time around (starting at mile marker :50) after it is done ‘downloading’ the file BRIEFLY shows up (1:17) in the destination folder, and then it disappears.

Anyone have any clues as to what is going on? This is the newest version of YouTube Downloader.

Read full topic
